title: Soumya Mukhopadhyay
text:
I am an undergrad student with a keen interest in the realms of machine learning, data science, econometrics and quantitative finance. I like to learn new things, seeking knowledge in domains besides tech as well whenever time and circumstances allow me. I also enjoy teaching and sharing my newfound knowledge by writing handouts.
In leisure, I like to spend time with my wonderful family and friends. There’s nothing quite like sharing laughter and creating memories together.

title: Soumya Mukhopadhyay
text:
Education
Indian Institute of Technology, Madras | Chennai, Tamil Nadu, IN
B.S. in Data Science and Applications | January 2022- January 2026 (Expected)

title: Hello, I’m Soumya!
text:
Welcome to my website! If you are looking for some awesome resources, I continuously keep updating them in - useful.
While you are here, you can check my “About me”. I will add my CV soon, but don’t ask me when, right now its an empty page.

title: Hello, I’m Soumya!
text:
This week
This is a section, that gets updated every Tuesday (if I remember to). You’ll find something interesting to spend your time in this section.
This week, let’s look at Prof. Martin Hairer’s talk on ``A Mathematical Journey through Scales” at Oxford Mathematics Public Lectures
